tool_description: GraphQL gateway to eBay's Sell REST APIs
name: eBay Sell Graph
title: eBay Sell Graph

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-sell-graph.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-sell-graph.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-sell-graph.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-sell-graph.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
